full_threads.body:

full_threads.body:
Hi Mark,

Sure. Confirming that we have made the updates. Please let us know if you would like further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Would you be able to change the mobile homepage to match?
Title- Bariatric and Upper GI Surgeon Sydney
Bullet point list- as per the desktop site

Also on the Anti-Reflux Surgery page the drop down boxes are a different design to the rest of the website, can these please be changed to match?
The hiatal hernia classification section needs to go above the preparation for surgery box.

Many thanks
Mark.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Mark,

Glad that you like the changes in the menus. Confirming that we have made the updates on the Home page. Please let us know if you would like further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi,

That was fast! Thanks very much. I like what you have done with the drop down menu's.

Adjustments

1. In the bullet point list under my name can you remove Inguinal Hernia Repair and Abdominal Wall Hernia Repair and just put Hernia Repair

2. For the common procedures boxes, can you please remove the Abdominal Wall Hernia Repair box- can the order of the boxes please be sleeve gastrectomy, gastric bypass, gallstone surgery, anti-reflux surgery, hernia repair, gastroscopy and colonoscopy. (The hernia repair box can just link to the inguinal hernia page).

Cheers Rica.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Mark, 

Hope all is well. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the links: 
https://drmarkboccola.com.au/surgery/sleeve-gastrectomy/
https://drmarkboccola.com.au/surgery/gastric-bypass/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi,


I'd like to break up the weight loss surgery page into to separate pages titled "Sleeve gastrectomy'' and "Gastric bypass".

In order to keep the page's clean appearance I think it's best to have the two hernia pages under the one title "Hernia repair".

So on the home page could you please change

1. Where it says "Laparoscopic General & Upper GI Surgeon Sydney" to ''Bariatric & Upper GI Surgeon Sydney"

2. The bullet point list underneath this to-

a. Sleeve gastrectomy

b. Gastric bypass

c. Gallstone surgery

d. Anti-reflux surgery

e. Hernia repair

f. Gastroscopy & Colonoscopy

3. The drop down menu under Surgery to appear

a. Sleeve gastrectomy

b. Gastric bypass

c. Gallstone surgery

d. Anti-reflux surgery

e. Hernia repair- Inguinal Hernia Repair

- Abdominal Wall Hernia Repair

f. Gastroscopy & Colonoscopy

Please find the two new pages with text attached, can you please use the diagrams with watermarks that are already appearing on the page.

Many thanks
Mark.
